subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored a game-high 31 points for the Miami Heat, but neither Dwyane Wade nor Chris Bosh were in All-Star form in the loss to the Boston Celtics.
snippet: LeBron James scored a game-high 31 points for the Miami Heat, but neither Dwyane Wade nor Chris Bosh were in All-Star form in the loss to the Boston Celtics.
